channel.title: Project Radon
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt]Project Radon[/size] [size=15pt][i]The next step.[/i][/center] Alright, so I'm not going to have much of an introduction but this is a project I've started on 4/21/2011. It's based off of a CLEANED PI that I've gone through myself which took me quite a few hours. I plan on programming it with the cleanest code possible, hence why I'm using the [b]Eclipse IDE[/b] for this project. Below will be the progress on each date. Enjoy. [code]4/21/2011: -Cleaned a PI source and client. -Fooled around with a few things. -Added 'RADON' points when you donate/level your skills. Every level you get 5 RADON points to spend in the points shop. -Made a webclient that I plan to be hosting on a domain. See below. -Did a few more things. Will be editing this date later. 4/22/2011: -I didn't like the right click and left click options, because sometimes it gets disabled so I re did the whole system. -Re-did home, NPCs, Shops, and Objects. 4/23/2011 -Adding clipping for NPCs -Improvised some code. -Fixed some dupes. 4/24/2011 & 4/25/2011: -Not much got done because of the holidays. [/code] This will be edited some more. [center][size=12pt][b]Donation:[/b][/size][/center] Okay, since I need a little money for a domain and VPS, I'm open for donations and when the server starts, you will have a senior donar rank which I plan on adding. [center][url=https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=JYN8YXP57K29A][img]https://www.paypalobjects.com/WEBSCR-640-20110401-1/en_US/i/btn/btn_donate_LG.gif[/img][/url][/center]
Of course this is [b]NOT MANDATORY[/b] you will still be able to play the server for free of course, when it comes online. [center][size=18pt][b]Photographs:[/b][/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9G60z.png[/img] Example how I am using imports and such to improve performance.[/center]
[center][b]Credits:[/b] winterLove - First source. Sainty - Project Insanity. Graham - Event Handler and a few other things. Galkon - Client. Stupit - Adding code and whatnot.[/center]

item.title: Project Radon
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“Diligo Deum, post:13, topic:392090”]In this image:

You don’t need to concatenate if you’re using an entire string
So just like like sendMessage(Config.WELCOME_MESSAGE);[/quote]
I knew that there could be a short convention I just didn’t have time to implement it. I will now though.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[center][size=20pt]Project Radon[/size]
[size=15pt]The next step.[/center]
Alright, so I’m not going to have much of an introduction but this is a project I’ve started on 4/21/2011. It’s based off of a CLEANED PI that I’ve gone through myself which took me quite a few hours. I plan on programming it with the cleanest code possible, hence why I’m using the Eclipse IDE for this project. Below will be the progress on each date. Enjoy.

4/21/2011: -Cleaned a PI source and client. -Fooled around with a few things. -Added 'RADON' points when you donate/level your skills. Every level you get 5 RADON points to spend in the points shop. -Made a webclient that I plan to be hosting on a domain. See below. -Did a few more things. Okay, since I need a little money for a domain and VPS, I’m open for donations and when the server starts, you will have a senior donar rank which I plan on adding.
